Job Description: You will be responsible for Interaction with partners and other team members to build and verify the solutions vis -vis the requirements and technical specifications   Take part in review of software requirements with relevant stakeholders Create Design Specifications   Design and develop software applications for web based Software Applications   Unit Testing for Requirements Developed      Use your skills to move the world forward!      We need an Engineering Graduate or Post Graduate (preferably a major in Computer Science/ Electronics) with 4-6 years experience on software design and development and unit testing using C#.   You should have proficiency in programming in C/C , 3 to 5 years of experience in C#.Net   Hands-on experience on C#.Net, WINFORMS, WPF and WCF   Experience in MFC and Std-Lib and XML know how   Familiar with use of Databases with know how of PCS 7/DCS/Automation
